key.name: colored-icons
key.summary: Show colored icons instead of symbolic icons
key.description: When enabled, notification icons will be displayed in their original colors. When disabled, they will be displayed as monochrome symbolic icons.

key.name: right-side
key.summary: Show icons on the right side of the clock
key.description: When enabled, notification icons will appear to the right of the clock in the top panel. When disabled, they will appear to the left.

key.name: dnd-mode
key.description: Controls when notification icons are shown when Do Not Disturb mode is active. Options: Always (0), Urgent Only (1), Never (2).

key.name: icon-size
key.description: Controls the size of notification icons in the top panel. Options: Small 16px (0), Medium 18px (1), Large 20px (2).
